title: UPI transaction value surges to Rs 1,669 lakh crore in first five months of FY25
description: The ministry stated that the transaction volume of digital payments has reached 8,659 crore during the same period. The value of UPI transactions has grown from Rs 1 lakh crore to Rs 200 lakh crore at a CAGR of 138%.
content: The value of digital payments has surged to Rs 1,669 lakh crore in the first five months (April-August) of the current financial year 2024-25, according to Union Finance Ministry.
cleaned_content: the value of digital payments has surged to rs <ONE_THOUSAND> lakh crore in the first five months april august of the current financial year <TWO_THOUSAND> <TWO_TEN> according to union finance ministry
